The word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> that came to Jeremiah<S>3414</S> the prophet<S>5030</S> against the Philistines<S>6430</S>, before that Pharaoh<S>6547</S> smote<S>5221</S> Gaza<S>5804</S>. <sup>Gaza: Heb. Azzah</sup>
Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; Behold, waters<S>4325</S> rise up<S>5927</S> out of the north<S>6828</S>, and shall be an overflowing<S>7857</S> flood<S>5158</S>, and shall overflow<S>7857</S> the land<S>776</S>, and all that is therein<S>4393</S>; the city<S>5892</S>, and them that dwell<S>3427</S> therein: then the men<S>120</S> shall cry<S>2199</S>, and all the inhabitants<S>3427</S> of the land<S>776</S> shall howl<S>3213</S>. <sup>all that: Heb. the fulness thereof</sup>
At the noise<S>6963</S> of the stamping<S>8161</S> of the hoofs<S>6541</S> of his strong<S>47</S> horses, at the rushing<S>7494</S> of his chariots<S>7393</S>, and at the rumbling<S>1995</S> of his wheels<S>1534</S>, the fathers<S>1</S> shall not look back<S>6437</S> to their children<S>1121</S> for feebleness<S>7510</S> of hands<S>3027</S>;
Because of the day<S>3117</S> that cometh<S>935</S> to spoil<S>7703</S> all the Philistines<S>6430</S>, and to cut off<S>3772</S> from Tyrus<S>6865</S> and Zidon<S>6721</S> every helper<S>5826</S> that remaineth<S>8300</S>: for the LORD<S>3068</S> will spoil<S>7703</S> the Philistines<S>6430</S>, the remnant<S>7611</S> of the country<S>339</S> of Caphtor<S>3731</S>. <sup>the country: Heb. the isle</sup>
Baldness<S>7144</S> is come<S>935</S> upon Gaza<S>5804</S>; Ashkelon<S>831</S> is cut off<S>1820</S> with the remnant<S>7611</S> of their valley<S>6010</S>: how long wilt thou cut<S>1413</S> thyself?
O<S>1945</S> thou sword<S>2719</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, how long will it be ere<S>3808</S> thou be quiet<S>8252</S>? put up<S>622</S> thyself into thy scabbard<S>8593</S>, rest<S>7280</S>, and be still<S>1826</S>. <sup>put: Heb. gather thyself</sup>
How can it be quiet<S>8252</S>, seeing the LORD<S>3068</S> hath given it a charge<S>6680</S> against Ashkelon<S>831</S>, and against the sea<S>3220</S> shore<S>2348</S>? there hath he appointed<S>3259</S> it. <sup>How: Heb. How canst thou</sup>
